transcript:
Customer: The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later. Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, veh abhi

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Uh, ji hi good evening Pravesh ji baat kar rahe hain Radha Krishna overseas se?

Customer: Haan baat kar raha hun bataiye.

Executive: Pravesh ji hi main Naveen baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?

Customer: Bas theek hun sir achha hun bataiye.

Executive: Pravesh ji abhi recently maine observe kiya aapne kya aapki ek call aayi thi hamare customer care se shayad Ranjit se aapka discussion hua hai kuch buyleads ko lekar jo issue aa raha tha sir.

Customer: Haan sir chhota issue nahi hai bahut bada issue aaya hai mere.

Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Bataya mujhe Ranjit ne Ranjit ne maine maine maine written mein cheeze di hain unko ab aap is cheez ko aisa bologe aapki taraf payment remaining isliye kar rahe hain aisa nahi hai maine last bhi call bhi vagaira hain agar aap unko bhi try karenge utha ke dekhenge to main satisfied nahi hun is plan ke baad pehle mera theek tha chal raha tha bura nahi bolunga mere ko achha uh theek tha ja business pehle lekin abhi recent mein jab se maine plan upgrade kiya hai na uske baad mere ko reality to hai mere ko mere paise nahi nikal pa rahe hain per day ka jo 13 1400 ko mere ko buylead ka jo ek jo kharcha aa raha hai us hisab se agar count karu to mere ko mere ko 13 1400 ka around something daily ka kharcha IndiaMART ko jo de raha hun mere ko wo wo recover nahi ho raha hai yaar.

Executive: Achha waise Pravesh sir maine ek cheez observe ki hai jaise jab aap star chalate the uske baad aapne jab upgrade kiya service to aapki jo inquiry the wo just double hui hai sir matlab average pehle theek tha agar inquiry se kya jab deal nahi hogi inquiry ho char guna ho jaye double to chhodega char guna ho jaye dekho apan apan kam kis liye ispe karte hain apne ko kya chahiye apne ko client chahiye genuine kam karne wala agar wo ghar pe lete lete baithe baithe usne bola ki sir maine inquiry to kiya tha lekin mere ko nahi chahiye nahi to sir ek bar double nahi wo char guna bhi ho jaye to kya karna usse bataiye usko main kya client samjhu hmm hmm kuch client aise bhi hain ki jinko mal to chahiye lekin us rate mein chahiye jis rate mein possibility hai hi nahi ab sir same cheez main aapke upar apply kar raha hun kya IndiaMART plan beche 1 lakh ka 1.5 lakh ka plan beche aur client ye bole sir nahi aisa karo 50000 mein de do 1.5 lakh wala plan kya IndiaMART de sakta hai nahi bilkul nahi sir to waha pe mere ko bahut takleef pareshani padi hoti hai na wo Pravesh sir aap ye dekhenge main ek chhota sa example deta hun theek hai har ek buyer ka jo mindset hai na wo judge karna aapke liye bhi tough hai hamare liye bhi tough hai agar man lijiye main customer hun maine main buyer hun main main main kya IndiaMART se maine requirement dala kisi cheez ka ab main buyer hun to main IndiaMART se just dial se do teen portal pe alag jaise requirement main dal sakta hun correct hmm ab jab main requirement post karta hun sir to har ek portal se mere pass man lijiye average le raha hun 20 se 25 call mere pass aati hai din mein to agar ye cheez aap dekhenge sir ki customer ka jo intuition hota hai agar wo din bhar mein man lijiye 50 se 60 call usko aa rahi hai to ek time pe na wo bhi frustrate ho jata hai aur mana kar deta hai ki nahi bhai mujhe nahi chahiye aap kyu pareshan kar rahe ho ya aap mujhe kyu call kar rahe ho to buyer ka jo intuition hai ye judge karna thoda sa tough hai hmm pehli cheez dusri cheez Pravesh ji har ek buylead ko har ek lead ko hum verify properly karte hain pehle aisa hota tha ki buyer ne thodi si detail bhari theek hai aur wo lead post ho jati thi to abhi humne verification process ko thoda sa strong kiya hai hum buyer se ab 70% specification bhi bharwa rahe hain sir pehle buyer nahi bharta tha theek hai hum unse quantity bhi puchna shuru kar diye hain hum unse unki size puch rahe hain ki kya aapko chahiye kis product ke liye requirement hai to detail mein sir ek second hold karna ek second hold karna client ka phone aa raha hai please ji the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe

Hello.

Aawaz aa rahi hai aapko Pravesh ji?

Hello.

Hello Pravesh ji.

Uh aapko aawaz aa rahi hai meri Pravesh ji?

Call pe hain aap Pravesh ji hello.

Hello.

Uh Pravesh ji aapko meri aawaz aa rahi hai abhi?

Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the plan after upgrading.

- Unable to recover money from the plan.

- Feels buyleads are not genuine.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the verification process.

- Executive mentioned about strengthened verification process.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, verification, client
